info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Transylvania and Henderson Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Hendersonville, or near Laurel Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Brevard, Mills River, Flat Rock, Etowah, Mountain Home, Laurel Park, Asheville Airport, B.R. Parkway-Mount Pisgah To The Nc Arboretum and Saluda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
